name: Sockventure
description:
Have fun dying!




Sockventure is a story about a kid whose favorite sock gets eaten by a cursed washing machine. Kid needs immediate help and calls superhero Sockman to the rescue and the adventure begins. Help Sockman to find his way through the dangerous levels to find the missing sock inside the washing machine!



Beat over 150 levels of hardcore platforming, get new skills such as wall jumping, dashing and stomping and bring the socks back safely. Unlock event levels, find the missing socks and customize your character with multiple unique outfits.

Features

  • 150+ Levels - Over 150 handcrafted Levels in 8 Chapters.
  • 4 Special Skills - Get new Skills during the game. Wall jumping, double jumping, dashing, stomping.
  • Coins - Find and collect all the coins to unlock Event Levels from each Chapter.
  • 8 Event Levels - Special Levels designed to challenge the player in new exciting ways.
  • Challenges - Multiple Challenges to beat for every Chapter.
  • Leaderboards - Try to get to the top of global leaderboards for every Chapter and Level.
  • 20+ Socks - Find hidden Socks and use them as your Skin.
  • Dark World - The Dark World opens when you beat all the regular Chapters of the game and offers new more challenging Levels for every Chapter to test your skills in.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1222340
